docs.title: Adv

docs.text: Welcome to Math Site This site includes: math for middle school, high school competition math (AMC 8/10/12, etc) Links: AoPS suggested books: https://artofproblemsolving.com/wiki/index.php/Math_books recommended competition math books: https://www.wukongsch.com/blog/zh/recommended-books-international-math-competitions-post-15872/ quick formula references: https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/maths AoPS Classical Book List Middle School Prealgebra Introduction to Algebra Introduction to Geometry Introduction to Counting & Probability Introduction to Number Theory High School Pre-calculus Calculus Intermediate Algebra Intermediate Counting & Probability Competition competition math for middle school (AIME level) the Art of Problem Solving Vol 1, Vol 2 First Steps For Math Olympians A First Course in Mathematical Modeling Challenging Problems In Geometry (high school) Omega Learn website : https://www.omegalearn.org/ AMC8, 10/12 books formula book other free materials
docs.title: Basic

docs.text: Management Ideas HBR: https://hbr.org/ A workaholic Guide to Reclaiming Your Life Redefining “urgent”: setup priority Reinventing the to-do list it is to document and prioritize, rather than just to finish it Learning to say “no” and delegate Fixing the workaholic clock: do not over-committing Controlling rumination Embracing rest and recovery
